system.title: System
system.description: Adjust system preferences to control Murmure's behavior at startup and more.

language.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface.

startOnBoot.title: Start on boot
startOnBoot.description: If enabled, Murmure will start automatically when your system starts.

copyToClipboard.title: Copy to Clipboard
copyToClipboard.description: Keep transcription in clipboard after recording finishes

historyPersistence.title: History persistence
historyPersistence.description: Store the last five transcriptions on disk. Disable to keep history in memory only.

visibility.title: Overlay visibility
visibility.description: Choose when to show the recording overlay.

position.title: Overlay position
position.description: Choose whether the overlay appears at the top or bottom.

api.title: Local API
api.description: Allows external apps to transcribe .wav files via HTTP.

port.title: API Port
port.description: Set the port number for the HTTP API (1024-65535)

shortcuts.title: Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Improve your workflow by setting up keyboard shortcuts.

pasteLastTranscript.title: Past last transcript
pasteLastTranscript.descriptionSuffix: to paste the last transcript. Useful when you forgot to select an input field when you started recording.
